What are the best hotels near Oakland County International Airport (PTK)?

HotelDescriptionLink 1. Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Waterford, an IHG Hotel The Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Waterford, an IHG Hotel is a well-liked 2 star hotel located about 2.5 miles east of Oakland County International Airport and about a 5 min. drive by car. With a guest review score of 4 out of 5, this makes it one of the premium hotels near Oakland County International Airport. 4 /5 Guest Reviews 2. Towneplace Suites by Marriott Detroit Auburn Hills The Towneplace Suites by Marriott Detroit Auburn Hills is a pleasing 3 star hotel located ~6.3 mi. east of Oakland County International Airport and about a 12 min. car ride. With a guest review score of 4 out of 5, this makes it one of the most enticing accommodations nearby Oakland County International Airport. 4 /5 Guest Reviews 3. Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Auburn Hills, an IHG Hotel The Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Auburn Hills, an IHG Hotel is an attractive 3-Star hotel located about 6.4 miles east of Oakland County International Airport and approx. a 12 minute drive or uber ride. With a verified guest score of 4.5/5, this makes it one of the finest accommodations near Oakland County International Airport. 4.5 /5 Guest Reviews 4. Baymont by Wyndham Auburn Hills The Baymont by Wyndham Auburn Hills is a crowd-pleasing 3-Star hotel located ~8.5 mi. east of Oakland County International Airport and approx. a 17 minute drive. With a verified guest score of 4/5, this makes it one of the most desirable hotel options nearby Oakland County International Airport. 4 /5 Guest Reviews
